title: [Large-scale] AI-Enhanced Blended Learning-Based Advanced Mathematics Education Design

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced high school mathematics foundations and understanding of secondary education math curriculum
context.additional_context: Visualization of mathematical concepts in simulation/VR environments and support for AI-driven personalized learning analytics

learning_goals: Learners can visualize and explain complex mathematical concepts in three-dimensional space using AI-based simulation tools.
Learners optimize math problem-solving workflows using generative AI and improve learning efficiency by over 20%.
Learners solve AI-generated math problems with peer learners in VR-based collaborative environments, demonstrating critical thinking skills.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
